TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMetadataExchange

summary.span: 公開用於傳回服務之相關中繼資料的方法。

span.span: Exposes methods used to return metadata about a service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在進行 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 服務的程式設計時，發行服務的相關中繼資料會很有幫助。When programming [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] services, it is useful to publish metadata about the service. 例如，中繼資料可以是 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件，會描述服務使用的所有方法和資料型別。For example, metadata can be a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document that describes all of the methods and data types employed by a service. 傳回 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服務的相關中繼資料可讓服務取用者很輕鬆地建立服務的用戶端。Returning metadata about an [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service allows consumers of a service to easily create clients for the service. 如需有關[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]中繼資料端點，請參閱[中繼資料](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/metadata.md)。For more information about [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] metadata endpoints, see [Metadata](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/metadata.md). 使用 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 實作的服務，會藉由公開一個或多個中繼資料端點來發行中繼資料。Services implemented using [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] publish metadata by exposing one or more metadata endpoints. [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 中的中繼資料端點如同其他端點般具有位址、繫結和合約。Metadata endpoints in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] have an address, a binding and a contract like any other endpoint. 介面會指定 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 中所有中繼資料端點實作的服務合約。The interface specifies the service contract implemented by all metadata endpoints in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]. 因此在您的服務實作中不需要實作 合約，There is no need to implement the contract in your service implementation. 而是要將 新增至服務描述。Instead, add the to the service description. 或者在使用組態時，將端點項目的 `contract` 屬性設定為 `IMetadataExchange`。Or, when using configuration, set the `contract` attribute of the endpoint element to `IMetadataExchange`. 如需範例，請參閱[How to： 使用組態檔的服務發行中繼資料](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-a-configuration-file.md)。For an example, see [How to: Publish Metadata for a Service Using a Configuration File](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-a-configuration-file.md). 如需詳細資料中發行中繼資料[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]看到[發行中繼資料](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/publishing-metadata.md)。For details on publishing metadata in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] see [Publishing Metadata](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/publishing-metadata.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginGet (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message request, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginGet(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message request, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginGet (request As Message, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginGet(System::ServiceModel::Channels::Message ^ request, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: request
param.span: 必須加以處理的 ，以決定要傳回的中繼資料。

span.span: A that should be processed to determine the metadata to return.

param.name: callback
param.span: 會指向將處理中繼資料的方法。

span.span: An that points to the method that will process the metadata.

param.name: state
param.span: 任何資料，可讓呼叫者判斷傳回的非同步呼叫。

span.span: Any data which allows the caller to determine which asynchronous call is being returned.

summary.span: 開始非同步擷取中繼資料。

span.span: Starts an asynchronous retrieval of metadata.
An that can be passed to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message EndGet(class System.IAsyncResult result) cil managed
Public Function EndGet (result As IAsyncResult) As Message

param.name: result
param.span: ，其中包含用於進一步處理中繼資料的資料。

span.span: An that contains data used to further process the metadata.

returns.span: 包含處理之中繼資料的 。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message Get(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message request) cil managed
Public Function Get (request As Message) As Message

span.span: A that contains the request for metadata.
